remarks: A simple path of length 2 between two vertices (in a graph) as ordered triple.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Mar-2018.)
statement:
el2spthonot0 $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ ( A e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( T e. ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) C ) <-> E. b e. V ( T = <. A , b , C >. /\ <. A , b , C >. e. ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) C ) ) ) ) $.
$d A b $.
$d C b $.
$d E b $.
$d T b $.
$d V b $.
$d X b $.
$d Y b $.
